post.body: I'm so far behind, too and I have NO IDEA what to get some people. STRESSED!
@mamarosa I'm thinking I just need to check @craftastrophe blog. One is SURE to turn up.
@rockandrollmama I was originally looking for childcare! and realized that would be too risky. Those people are kooks.
Classy! Hope the coffee mug has some really cheesy saying on it. Maybe something like, "I love bean dip."
Did you mean to send me a blank email a few minutes ago?
I sent Karla some pics...I'll send you some quotes right now...
I haven't tried that...not sure I'm familiar? email me? playgroupie at gmail dot com...
I have tried coding it in the html and yet the text won't f%$^ing wrap. Ahem. Thank you, though!
I know, I'm kinda embarrassed by such a rookie mistake. I should be an EXPERT on dishwashing, I have my Ph.D. in it.
@ModernMatriarch Oh I agree! Daniel Cook is WAY annoying.
You should send the link to @craftastrophe!
Oooh! I'm jealous!!!
I've never been there either. But I AM going to see you in Nashville!! So excited about that!
In my dream, we totally forgot to invite you and I was freaking out and trying to get AFF to call you and invite you. Weird.
yeah, my dream was about you and lots of other bloggers. We were having a meetup in Pittsburgh.
Not to sound creepy, but I had a dream about you last night.
OMG, Craigslist forums are full of freaks. Yet I couldn't look away.
I just hung up on my husband. He totally deserved it.
RT @shefinds is giving away a $500 #Kmart Gift Card on her blog - simply tweet or comment to enter http://urlbrief.com/22d898".
Does anyone know how to make the the text wrap the image in WP? I can't get it to work and have lost a lot of hair trying.
Broke the cardinal rule of dishwashing. Didn't rinse the rice crispies from the bowl and am now dealing with the superglued remnants.
My son's first celebrity crush: Emily Yeung. A sassy, exotic Canadian! Thanks Disney Channel.
Bedtime took extra 5 mins b/c son was blowing goodnite kisses to his sister. My heart has officially overflowed.
Just discovered that my children hate mandarin oranges. I always knew there was something off about them.
I am totally fine. Really.
Now they have to come back later tonight (when I was going to go buy a new dryer) to deliver the right sofa.
La-z boy is at my house right now trying to give me the WRONG SOFA. I don't want the ugly sofa, I want the one I ordered.
Coming out of hiding. *waves* So what's up?
